alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:03PM EDT until May 16 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Northern Johnson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Russell County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southeastern Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 603 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Bristol Va, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Mountain City, Walnut Hill, Glade Spring, Damascus, Laurel Bloomery, Emory-Meadow View and Blountville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 69 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 34. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm, capable of producing severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington
